columns.account_id: Associated account ID for the transaction
columns.transaction_type: Type of credit transaction (e.g., deposit, refund)

columns.account_id: Associated account ID for the transaction
columns.transaction_type: Type of debit transaction (e.g., purchase, withdrawal)

customer_risk_markers.description: Indicates risk factors associated with customers.

columns.risk_score: Risk score assigned to the customer
columns.risk_level: Categorical risk level (e.g., high, medium, low)
columns.insolvency_marker: Indicates if the customer is insolvent (yes or no)

columns.complaint_date: Date when the complaint was registered
columns.status: Status of the complaint (e.g., resolved, pending)

columns.average_balance: Average balance in the account for the month
columns.high_balance: Highest balance in the account for the month
columns.low_balance: Lowest balance in the account for the month

customer_biometrics_session_level.description: Session-level biometrics and usage details for customer mobile app interactions.

columns.last_activity: Last activity timestamp in the session
columns.mobile_banking: Binary indicator for mobile banking usage
columns.internet_banking: Binary indicator for internet banking usage
columns.telephone_banking: Binary indicator for telephone banking usage

columns.survey_id: Unique identifier for each survey response
columns.survey_date: Date when the survey was completed
columns.satisfaction_score: Satisfaction score given by the customer
columns.feedback_comments: Additional comments provided by the customer

columns.goal_id: Unique identifier for each financial goal
columns.goal_type: Type of financial goal (e.g., retirement, saving for home)
columns.target_amount: Target amount for the financial goal
columns.goal_date: Target date to achieve the financial goal

fraud_alerts_and_flags.description: Contains records of fraud alerts and flags on customer accounts.

columns.alert_date: Date when the alert was triggered
columns.severity: Severity level of the fraud alert

columns.overdraft_limit: Overdraft limit set for the account
columns.usage_date: Date when the overdraft was used

mortgage_and_loan_repayment_history.description: Repayment history for mortgages and loans.

columns.behavior_score: Behavior score based on transaction patterns

columns.assessment_id: Unique identifier for each risk assessment
columns.credit_score: Credit score assigned to the customer
columns.risk_category: Risk category based on credit score

customer_marketing_interactions.description: Records of marketing interactions with customers.

columns.interaction_id: Unique identifier for each marketing interaction
columns.channel: Channel through which the interaction took place

customer_referral_and_advocacy.description: Details of customer referrals and advocacy actions.

customer_product_lifecycle_engagement.description: Tracks customer engagement throughout the product lifecycle.

columns.engagement_id: Unique identifier for each engagement record
columns.engagement_stage: Stage in product lifecycle (e.g., onboarding, usage)

customer_rewards_and_loyalty.description: Records of customer rewards and loyalty program participation.

columns.reward_date: Date when the reward was issued

customer_service_interaction.description: Records of interactions between customer service and customers.

columns.interaction_id: Unique identifier for each service interaction
columns.interaction_outcome: Outcome of the interaction (e.g., resolved, escalated)

customer_online_security_alerts.description: Security alerts related to customer online activity.

columns.alert_id: Unique identifier for each security alert
columns.alert_date: Date when the alert was triggered
columns.alert_type: Type of security alert (e.g., login from new device)

cross_sell_and_upsell_opportunities.description: Potential cross-sell and upsell opportunities identified for customers.

columns.opportunity_date: Date when the opportunity was identified
columns.product_suggested: Product suggested for cross-sell or upsell
columns.success_probability: Probability score indicating likelihood of success

debt_collection_and_recovery.description: Records of debt collection and recovery actions.

columns.collection_id: Unique identifier for each collection action
columns.collection_date: Date when the collection action was initiated
columns.outcome: Outcome of the collection action (e.g., fully collected, partially collected)

atm_and_branch_transaction_logs.description: Logs of transactions performed at ATMs and branches.

columns.account_id: Associated account ID for the transaction
columns.location: Location where the transaction was performed (ATM or branch)

customer_account_closure_requests.description: Records of customer requests to close their accounts.

columns.closure_request_id: Unique identifier for each closure request
columns.request_date: Date when the closure request was made
columns.status: Current status of the closure request (e.g., pending, completed)

business_customer_public_information.description: Public information about business banking customers.

columns.business_id: Unique identifier for each business customer
columns.number_of_stakeholders: Number of stakeholders in the business

columns.goal_date: Target date to achieve the goal

columns.loan_account_id: Unique identifier for each loan account
columns.interest_rate: Interest rate applied to the loan

customer_model_risk_scores.description: Model-based risk scores assigned to customers for various risks.

columns.model_score_id: Unique identifier for each model risk score
columns.mule_risk_score: Score indicating the risk of mule behavior
columns.fraud_risk_score: Score indicating the risk of fraudulent activity
columns.scam_risk_score: Score indicating the risk of scams
columns.money_laundering_risk_score: Score indicating the risk of money laundering

customer_satisfaction_survey_results.description: Records of customer satisfaction survey responses.

columns.feedback: Text feedback provided by the customer

customer_marketing_interactions.description: Marketing interactions and engagement with customers.

columns.channel: Channel used for marketing (e.g., email, SMS)
columns.outcome: Outcome of the interaction (e.g., engagement, no engagement)

mortgage_and_loan_repayment_history.description: Repayment history of customer mortgages and loans.

columns.repayment_id: Unique identifier for each repayment record
